check-status.content: Check git status to see what files have been modified

review-changes.content: Review changes using git diff to ensure all modifications are intentional

stage-files.content: Stage files for commit using git add (specific files or git add .)

commit-changes.content: Commit changes with a clear, descriptive commit message

pull-latest.content: Pull latest changes from remote to avoid conflicts (git pull)

resolve-conflicts.content: Resolve any merge conflicts if they occur during pull

push-changes.content: Push changes to remote repository (git push)

verify-push.content: Verify push was successful by checking remote repository
